comments.content:
The original is this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230222441im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elvis_presley_album_5460.jpg)
  
Concerning both: Not fonts but handmade.
I hadn’t listened to London Calling for quite some time. I put it on this morning, and what shall I say – it’s still one of the best albums of all times. Thanks for reminding me.

<cite>it’s still one of the best albums of all times</cite>  
Seconded.

As for the typeface, here's a thorough analysis about it:  
 [http://answers.google.com/answers/threadview?id=6303](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230222441/http:/answers.google.com/answers/threadview?id=6303 "http://answers.google.com/answers/threadview?id=6303")

I thought someone would have made a free font out of it by now, but I was unable to locate it, if it exist.

Seems quite close to [House-A-Rama Kingpin](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230222441/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/housearama). See sample attached.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230222441im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KingpinSample_4729.gif)
